casebody.data:
EASTWAY WRECKER SERVICE
v.
CHARLOTTE. No. 467A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2005. Thomas L. Odom, Jr., for Eastway Wrecker Service. Cynthia White, Senior Assistant City Attorney, S. Jujeeb Shah-Khan, Assistant City Attorney, for City of Charlotte.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of August 2005 by Plaintiff for Leave to File a Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of August 2005."
